sect3.title: Readonly Amendments
sect3.para: Anonymous classes may now be marked as readonly.
Readonly properties can now be reinitialized during cloning.

sect3.title: Typed Class Constants
sect3.para: Class, interface, trait, and enum constants now support type declarations.

sect3.title: Closures created from magic methods
sect3.para: Closures created from magic methods can now accept named arguments.

sect3.title: The final modifier with a method from a trait
sect3.para: The final modifier may now be used when using a method from a trait.

sect3.title: Override Attribute
sect3.para: Added the #[\Override] attribute to check that a method exists in a parent class or implemented interface.

sect3.title: Fetch class constant dynamically syntax
sect3.para: Class constants can now be accessed dynamically using the C::{$name} syntax.

sect3.title: Static variable Initializers
sect3.para: Static variable initializers can now contain arbitrary expressions.

sect3.title: Fallback value syntax for ini variables

sect2.title: CLI
sect2.para: It is now possible to lint multiple files.

sect2.title: DOM
sect2.para: Added properties DOMElement::$className and DOMElement::$id. These are not binary-safe at the moment because of underlying limitations of libxml2. This means that the property values will be cut off at a NUL byte.

sect2.title: FFI
sect2.para: It is now possible to assign FFI\CData to other FFI\CData. Meaning CData can now be assigned to structs and fields.

sect2.title: Opcache
sect2.para: opcache_get_status()['scripts'][n]['revalidate'] now contains a Unix timestamp of when the next revalidation of the scripts timestamp is due, dictated by the opcache.revalidate_freq INI directive.

sect2.title: POSIX
sect2.para: posix_getrlimit now takes an optional $resource parameter to allow fetching a single resource limit.
posix_isatty now raises type warnings for integers following the usual ZPP semantics.
posix_ttyname now raises type warnings for integers following the usual ZPP semantics and value warnings for invalid file descriptor integers.

sect2.title: Streams
sect2.para: Streams can now emit the STREAM_NOTIFY_COMPLETED notification. This was previously not implemented.
